DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.ShuntingRoutesEndPointFilter: if ((RcType == "JBTSA_SIG Signal" or RcType == "JBTSA_ERT ERTMS-signal") and Variant:lower():match("dvergsignal") then return NOBN_sig_getSignalNumber() elseif ((RcType == "JBTSA_FIK Fiktivt punkt" and Variant == "Fiktivt sluttpunkt for togvei") or (RcType == "JBTSA_SIG Togvei slutt")) then return code end
DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.ViaPointFilter: if (RcType == "JBTSA_FIK Fiktivt punkt" and Variant == "Viapunkt for betjeningsanlegg") then return "(v"..code..")" end
DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.ExtendedRoutePartFormatScript: base = StartName .. "-" .. EndName if ViaPoints.Count > 0 then via = ViaPoints[0].Value for i=1, ViaPoints.Count-1 do via = via .. "-" .. ViaPoints[i].Value end return base .. " via " .. via else return base end
DefaultInterlockingExportOptions.SwitchNameScript: dir = (position == "left") and "V" or "H" return switchObj.code .. dir
